product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad - Long - Special Buy
long_description: Get a good night's rest while backpacking with the long ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad. It has an anti-slip ALPS logo on the top to help keep your sleeping bag from sliding around. Jet Stream foam inside the pad allows for a quick self inflation and fast deflation once the brass valves are opened. R-value equals 5.0; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). Top fabric is composed of a double-line ripstop and the bottom is composed of polyester taffeta, making the pad lightweight, yet durable. Comes with a repair kit in case you get a small puncture while you're out on your adventure and need to patch it up. ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: Get a good night's rest while backpacking with the long ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad. It has an anti-slip ALPS logo on the top to help keep your sleeping bag from sliding around.
